title: Dairy free green smoothie
ingredients: ['240ml coconut water', '1 frozen chopped banana', '1 apple, cored', '1 large leaf pak choi or handful of chopped kale', '2 tablespoons sliced broccoli florets, or to taste', '1 tablespoon grated coconut', '1 tablespoon chia seeds', '1 (2.5cm) piece fresh ginger, peeled', '1 teaspoon spirulina powder (optional)']
